pr_title: [systemtest] Add forgotten profile tags to tests

timeline.bodyText: You should change also a comment.

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure if those tests should have SCALABILITY tag. I will leave the decision to other.
timeline.author: Frawless

replies.bodyText:
I would keep it there, although test scales up just from 1 -> 2 pods.
Maybe scale to 3~5 and tag is deserved there :)

timeline.message:
add forgotten tags in tests
